news_header: China is worried about rising tensions in the Korean Peninsula and seeks a political solution.
news_text: China expresses concern over escalating tensions in the Korean Peninsula, urging for a political resolution. North Korea has tested an intercontinental ballistic missile to enhance its nuclear capabilities, shortly after the US and South Korea requested the withdrawal of North Korean troops from Russia, where 10,000 troops have been deployed and may soon be sent to the Ukrainian front.
